00032 static const XMLCh gDefOutOfMemoryErrMsg[] =
00033 {
00034         chLatin_O, chLatin_u, chLatin_t, chLatin_O
00035     ,   chLatin_f, chLatin_M, chLatin_e, chLatin_m
00036     ,   chLatin_o, chLatin_r, chLatin_y, chNull
00037 };

00070 inline XMLExcepts::Codes OutOfMemoryException::getCode() const
00071 {

00073 }

00086 {
00087     return "";

00091     return 0;
